snippet: A look at the latest developments as the state awaits new Congressional district lines based on the 2010 census.
abstract: Update of New York State's attempts to redraw its political maps to reflect the 2010 census; Legislature approves new maps for the Senate and Assembly negotiated with Gov Andrew M Cuomo, as well as proposed constitutional amendment that would create a bipartisan redistricting commission after the 2020 census.
lead_paragraph: A look at the latest developments as the state awaits new Congressional district lines based on the 2010 census.

headline.seo: Unmapped — Update on New York Redistricting
headline.main: An Update on New York Redistricting
